amendment.description: To encourage the Secretary of Defense to achieve maximum cost effective energy savings.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3395 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3395 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S6785-6789; text: CR S6786) To encourage the Secretary of Defense to achieve maximum cost effective energy savings.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3395 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3395 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Collins.
